{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Edimax |model=Gemini RG21S |revision=1.0A |ean=4717964701114 |est_release_date=04/13/2017 |fcc_date=03/08/2017 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=Yes |availability=now |type=wireless router |fcc_id=NDD9568771606 |pcb_id=1244-01001054-50Z |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=MediaTek |cpu1_model=MT7621AT |cpu1_cspeed=880 |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=16 |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |fla2=2 |fla2_brand= |fla2_model=NOR |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5CC64M16GP-DI |wi1_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi1_chip1_model=MT7615N |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL,RP-SMA |wi1_txchains=4 |wi1_rxchains=4 |wi1_sstreams=4 |wi2_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi2_chip1_model=MT7615N |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL,RP-SMA |wi2_txchains=4 |wi2_rxchains=4 |wi2_sstreams=4 |eth_cpu=true |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags=Wave2, MU-MIMO, 256QAM, |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=1234 }}
:• '''1733Mbps''' - 4SS 5GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11ac#Data_rates_and_speed 802.11ac] (80MHz chan.), :• '''800Mbps''' - 4SS 2.4GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11n-2009#Data_rates 802.11n] (40MHz chan., 256QAM) = '''''2600 Mbps'' class'''
{{TagLine|AC2600 MU-MIMO Home Wi-Fi Roaming Router}} :[http://www.edimax.com/edimax/merchandise/merchandise_detail/data/edimax/global/wireless_routers_ac2600/rg21s/ Product page] {{•}} [http://www.edimax.com/edimax/mw/cufiles/files/download/datasheet/RG21S_Datasheet_English.pdf Datasheet] "1244-01001054-50Z" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. ===Specifications=== * Product class: ''AC2600'' (800Mbps [2.4GHz] + 1733Mbps [5GHz]) * Antennas: 4x external high-gain antenna * Ports: 1x GbE WAN, 4x GbE LAN * Vendor firmware features: MU-MIMO, Guest Network, :VPN server: OpenVPN Server *Vendor firmware operation modes: wireless router, access point ===Agregation=== *[https://www.speedguide.net/routers/edimax-rg21s-ac2600-mu-mimo-home-wi-fi-roaming-3871 On '''SpeedGuide'''] *[https://uk.hardware.info/product/394233/edimax-rg21s/specifications On '''HardWare.info'''] ===Forum threads=== *[https://openitforum.pl/index/recenzje/routery/edimax/gemini-rg21s/ ''Edimax Gemini RG21S'' on '''OpenITforum'''] (PL) :*CPU: [[MediaTek MT7621AT]] @880MHz Dual Core :*Flash: 16MB (NOR) Flash :*RAM: ''Nanya'' NT5CC64M16GP-DI (128MB DDR3) :*WLAN: 2x [[MediaTek]] MT7615N 4T4R 802.11abgn/ac ==Images== *[https://openitforum.pl/gallery/album/249-edimax-gemini-rg21s/ ''Edimax Gemini RG21S'' Gallery on '''OpenITforum'''] __NOTOC__
